title: Ishuzoku Reviewers (Interspecies Reviewers)
synopsis: Countless diverse races, from perky fairies to oozing slimes, inhabit the world. Naturally, such a melting pot of creatures has a broad and alluring variety of brothels. With so many options to choose from, it is hard to decide with which succu-girl to have a meaningful, interpersonal experience.
voices: ['Tomita, Miyu', 'Majima, Junji', 'Kobayashi, Yuusuke', 'Ichimichi, Mao', 'Hikasa, Youko', 'Yuasa, Kaede', 'Igarashi, Hiromi', 'Koyama, Momoyo', 'Hino, Mari', 'Nukui, Yuka']
staff: [['Ogawa, Yuuki', ['Director', ' Episode Director']], ['Hirasawa, Hisayoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Tatsuwa, Naoyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Majima, Takahiro', ['Episode Director', ' Assistant Director']]]
